price: A Ja sam čak dopustio ovima, a i precima njihovim da uživaju sve dok im nije došla Istina i Poslanik očevidni.
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿtu hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā jāahumu al-ḥaqu warasūlun mubīnun
